visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a 3D column chart with the following specifications: Chart type: column, Chart title: Monthly Average Rainfall, Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color for the title, labels, and axes with a font size of 14px, Data series: Include one series with the name 'Rainfall' and data points [29.9, 71.5, 106.4, 129.2, 144.0, 176.0, 135.6, 148.5, 216.4, 194.1, 95.6, 54.4], Custom colors: Use a gradient from light blue to dark blue for the columns, Additional configurations: Enable 3D options with alpha: 15, beta: 15, depth: 50, and set the chart margin to 75.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a 3D column chart with specific styling and data series. The chart type is set to 'column', and 3D options are enabled with alpha, beta, and depth values to give the chart a three-dimensional appearance. The chart title is 'Monthly Average Rainfall', styled with a dark blue color and a font size of 14px. The axes labels and titles are also styled with the same dark blue color and font size. The data series includes one series named 'Rainfall' with monthly data points. The columns are colored with a gradient from light blue to dark blue, enhancing the visual appeal. Additional configurations include setting the chart margin to 75 and enabling the 3D effect for the columns with a depth of 25.
